modName: ON THE EDGE OF YOUR NERVES - Skyrim Music Conversion
summary: \"Orchestral\" Music for Skyrim, re-cutted, re-mastered and re-edited from diverse Instrument Samplers and Libraries New music packages will be added to this site until i get bored.
descriptionHtml:
NEWS: Oct 30th 2012: Added WAV (High Quality Audio Format) version, which can be used ingame
                                    as well as listened to outside of the game. 3part upload, because single file
                                    upload failed several times. Blame the servers, not me!

NEWS: Oct 26th 2012: OTEOYN Skyrim Music Conversion V2 uploaded. 
                                   (contains the earlier Drop Dead Edition music plus more)

     IMPORTANT!!!! YOU NEED THE MOD \"PERSONALIZED MUSIC SYSTEM V5\" for the music
     to play ingame. Get it below (48kb upload package in the mainfile section;
     uploaded at 6:27, 4 September 2012)

     PERSONALIZED MUSIC SYSTEM (V5)
     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13286

Updated to Version 2 

- 9 Combat tracks (includes the tracks of the earlier \"Drop Dead Edition\" of course, but
  Personalized Music System friendly now)
- 1 Castle track
- 18 Explore tracks (Day)
- 3 Explore tracks (Night)
- 1 Explore track (Morning)
- 1 Special track (death jingle)

More tracks are in the making
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

++++ NEWS: April 14th 2012:  OTEOYN SKY - Drop Dead Edition V1  UPLOADED!!!!
5 adrenaline pumpin\' BATTLE tracks 
(The other Editions are still in the making. Drop Dead Dungeon and Countryside music will follow soon) PLEASE ALSO VISIT THE IMAGE SECTION FOR INFORMATIONS :)

                                                            PLEASE LEAVE COMMENTS!!!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                         OTEOYN (ON THE EDGE OF YOUR NERVES) SKYRIM MUSIC CONVERSION
                
                         WILL COME IN DIFFERENT STYLES, JUST LIKE THOSE ENB MODS OR 
                         WARS IN SKYRIM DO. 

                         - DROP DEAD Edition (V1 uploaded): Very modern instrumentation
                                                                                  think 24, Nikita and the like.
                         
                         - SAVAGE EDITION: A bit on the \"Conan\" side, somewhat tribal,
                                                       but in a classical, not techno sense.

                         - CLOAK AND DAGGER: Music that might fit Pirate Movies, only
                                                             i make sure it fits Skyrim even more. 
                                                             High spirits so to say :)

                         - TRUE MEDIEVAL: Somewhat inbetween \"Savage\" and \"Cloak and Dagger\"

--------

PLEASE LEAVE COMMENTS IF YOU BELIEVE I AM HEADED IN THE WRONG DIRECTION.
THIS MOD IS AS MUCH FOR YOU AS IT IS FOR ME AND I WILL DO MY VERY BEST
TO MAKE THE GAME THE MOST JOYFUL EXPERIENCE EVER - YOUR CRITICAL WORDS
ARE MORE THAN WELCOM!!!! THAT GOES FOR PRAISE TOO :P

New music packages and updates will be added to this site until i get bored. Right now there are only Pre-listen samples of what i\'ve created. Finding the right music for Skyrim must be done carefully, so please give me some time for experiencing the game and doing my musical research. 
In the meantime: 

Enjoy!

olaf
author: olafreinhardweyer
